  • Method Details

    • curLiveStatus

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject curLiveStatus​(Auth auth, String channel)
      Uses the Twitch API to check the current status of a channel and get required data if live
      Parameters:
      auth - Auth object that holds the API keys
      channel - The name of the channel to check the status of
      Returns:
      JSONObject of the channel if found otherwise null;

    • getOldStatus

      public static HashMap<String,​Boolean> getOldStatus​(File file)
      Reads the JSON config file, and gets the old live status of a channel
      Parameters:
      file - The JSON config file
      Returns:
      A HashMap with the name of the channel and the old live status

    • updateStatus

      public static void updateStatus​(List<Channel> channels, File file)
      Gets the current live status from the channels list and writes it to the JSON config file
      Parameters:
      channels - List of channel objects
      file - JSON config file which contains the channels

    • validChannel

      public static boolean validChannel​(String channel)
      Checks if the Twitch channel is valid using regex and the Twitch API
      Parameters:
      channel - The name of the channel to check if it's valid
      Returns:
      True if the channel name is valid otherwise false

    • validConfig

      public static boolean validConfig()
      Simple function to make sure JSON config file contains the required keys
      Returns:
      True if JSON config is valid, otherwise false

    • buildRequest

      private static okhttp3.Request buildRequest​(Auth auth, String channel)
      Helper functions that builds a POST request
      Parameters:
      auth - The API Keys required to send the request
      channel - The name of the Twitch channel
      Returns:
      A HTTP POST request
